metrics.name: Production quantity accuracy
metrics.description: Rate between total process order quantities and total goods receipt quantities
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	"Produced Delivered Quantity"/"Total Order Quantity")
	FILTER(WHERE "Delivery Completed" IS NOT NULL)
*100

metrics.name: Process orders specific status
metrics.description: Total process orders with a specific status

metrics.name: Process orders without planned orders
metrics.description: Total process orders created without planned order reference
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id)
	FILTER(WHERE "Planned Order Number" IS NULL)

metrics.name: Planning rate
metrics.description: Process orders with planned order reference and total process orders
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id)
	FILTER(WHERE "Planned Order Number" IS NOT NULL)
/ 
COUNT(case_id)
*100

metrics.name: Number of goods receipts
metrics.description: Total number of single goods receipt postings
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM((
	SELECT COUNT(event_name)
	FILTER(WHERE event_name LIKE 'GR%')))

metrics.name: Automation rate specific event
metrics.description: Automation rate for a specific event
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM(
	(SELECT COUNT(event_name)
	FILTER (
		WHERE ((${mts_automation_condition})
		AND event_name IN (${mts_automation_event_name})))))
/ SUM(
	(SELECT COUNT(event_name)
	FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN (${mts_automation_event_name})))))
*100

metrics.name: Process orders overdue for release
metrics.description: Process orders where the scheduled release date is in the past and the actual release date is pending
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id)
	FILTER (WHERE "Scheduled Release Date" < NOW()
	AND "Actual Release Date" IS NULL)

metrics.name: Process orders overdue for delivery
metrics.description: Process orders where the scheduled finish date is in the past and the actual delivery date is pending
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id)
	FILTER (WHERE "Scheduled Finish Date" < NOW()
	AND "Actual Delivery Date" IS NULL)

metrics.name: Start date: difference scheduled and actual date
metrics.description: Average difference of the scheduled start date minus the actual start date

metrics.name: Finish date: difference scheduled and actual date
metrics.description: Average difference of the scheduled finish date minus the actual finish date

metrics.name: Release date: difference scheduled and actual date
metrics.description: Average difference of the scheduled release date minus the actual release date

metrics.name: Late delivery rate
metrics.description: Percentage of late delivered orders from total orders
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE "Actual Delivery Date" IS NOT NULL
	AND ("Actual Delivery Date" - "Scheduled Finish Date" > DURATION '0days'))
/
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE "Actual Delivery Date" IS NOT NULL)
*100

metrics.name: Early delivery rate
metrics.description: Percentage of early delivered orders from total orders
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE "Actual Delivery Date" IS NOT NULL
	AND ("Actual Delivery Date" - "Scheduled Finish Date" < DURATION '0days')
	)
/
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE"Actual Delivery Date" IS NOT NULL)
*100

metrics.name: On-time delivery rate
metrics.description: Percentage of on-time delivered orders from total orders
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE "Actual Delivery Date" IS NOT NULL
	AND "Actual Delivery Date" - "Scheduled Finish Date" = DURATION '0days'
	)
/
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE "Actual Delivery Date" IS NOT NULL)
*100

metrics.name: Order release lead Time
metrics.description: Time from order creation to order release
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER(
	WHERE event_name = 'Released'))
	-
(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER(
	WHERE event_name = 'Create Process Order'))
	)

metrics.name: Order confirmation lead time
metrics.description: Time from order release to order confirmation
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER(
	WHERE event_name = 'Confirmed'))
	-
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER(
	WHERE event_name = 'Released'))
	)

metrics.name: Manufacturing lead time
metrics.description: Time from order release to order receipt
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER(
	WHERE event_name LIKE 'GR%'))
	-
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER(
	WHERE event_name = 'Released'))
	)

variables.name: mts_automation_condition
variables.description: User type indicating that an event is performed automatically and not by an employee, for example 'Batch Job'

defaultValues.defaultValue: "Event Created By User Type" IN ('System','Service','Batch Job')

variables.name: mts_automation_event_name
variables.description: Specific event for which the automation rate is calculated, for example 'Create Process Order'

variables.name: mts_po_status_event_name
variables.description: Process order status indicating a specific stage in the process, for example 'Technically completed'
